origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'TradeAnalysisAPI.analyze_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of global trade trends on specified markets in a given year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'trade_trend', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The trend of global trade to analyze, e.g., global, regional.'}, {'name': 'market_type', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of market to analyze, e.g., emerging, developed.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the impact is analyzed.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'A report detailing the impact of global trade trends on the specified markets.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 TradeAnalysisAPI.analyze_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'trade_trend'是'global', 'market_type'是'emerging', 'year'是'2023'.
